CustomField.description: As of Sep 2020- If any invoices are open 20+ days, Account is "Behind" on billing status. This will auto update with nightly invoice updates from NetSuite. This will also push to Plan object and will continue to be a part of the client health score.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: As of Sep 2020- If any invoices are open 20+ days, Account is "Behind" on billing status. This will auto update with nightly invoice updates from NetSuite
CustomField.label: Billing Status
